AND wo.production_id LIKE '%' || #{prdctPlanId} || '%'
AND wo.id LIKE '%' || #{workOrderId} || '%'
AND (i.id LIKE '%' || #{itemIdOrName} || '%' OR i.name LIKE '%' || #{itemIdOrName} || '%')
AND wo.status_code IN
#{code}
ORDER BY wo.id DESC
